Date.description: The date when the gold rate was recorded, in MM/DD/YYYY format

Country.description: The country where the gold rate was recorded, in this case, India

value_dict.India: The country where the gold rate was recorded

State.description: The state within the country where the gold rate was recorded, in this case, Tamilnadu

value_dict.Tamilnadu: The state within the country India where the gold rate was recorded

Location.description: The specific location within the state where the gold rate was recorded, in this case, Chennai

value_dict.Chennai: The specific location within the state Tamilnadu where the gold rate was recorded

Pure Gold (24 k).description: The rate of pure gold (24 karat) on the recorded date, in Indian Rupees

Standard Gold (22 K).description: The rate of standard gold (22 karat) on the recorded date, in Indian Rupees

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in analyzing gold rates.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the date, country, state, and location, please predict the rate of Pure Gold (24 k).
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted rate of Pure Gold (24 k) is ______.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in analyzing gold rates.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the date, country, state, and location, please predict the rate of Standard Gold (22 K).
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted rate of Standard Gold (22 K) is ______.
